sentence.text: Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) is a devastating adult-onset progressive neurodegenerative disease characterized by upper and lower motoneuron degeneration.

The inhibition of CTGF/CCN2 with the monoclonal neutralizing antibody FG-3019 reduces fibrosis in several chronic disorders including the mdx mice, a murine model for Duchenne muscular dystrophy (DMD).
